idea-plugin.name: Embedded Browser
idea-plugin.description:
View a web page directly within IntelliJ IDEA!
  • Type any web url in the address bar
  • Alternatively, type a text which will be sent to the configured search engine
  • Basic history is supported, up to a configurable number of items
  • Embedded Browser may also be registered as an additional Web Browser within IntelliJ and may be selected when viewing a locally open html file
To configure it, open up the Settings menu Ctrl Alt S and select Embedded Browser
  • Search engine template
    • Fill in with the url of the search engine to use, replacing the query string with 'TOKEN'. For example: http://www.google.com?q=TOKEN
  • Add To Web Browsers
    • Click this button to register Embedded Browser as a Web Browser (this button will be disabled if already registered).
